attributes.action: repeal the implementation of the Independant Safeguarding Authorities vetting and barring scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the public opinion towards this new legislation it would be in the best interests of everyone in the country if this costly and ill-planned scheme was scrapped.  The people who are most likely to harm vulnerable adults aren't covered by these checks, therefore the entire vetting and barring system is pointless in its current state.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
